text: The following is a list of episodes for the Dinosaur King anime series. ==Episode list== ===Season One=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:98%;" |- ! style="background:#fca845;"| # ! style="background:#fca845;"| English dub title (top) Japanese title (bottom) ! style="background:#fca845;"| Japan (Original airdate) ! style="background:#fca845;"| USA airdate ! style="background:#fca845;"| UK airdate |- | colspan="5" style="background:#ff7518;"| |- |} ===Season Two=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:98%;" |- ! style="background:#7cfc00;"| # ! style="background:#7cfc00;"| English dub title (top) Japanese title (bottom) ! style="background:#7cfc00;"| Japan (Original airdate) ! style="background:#7cfc00;"| USA airdate ! style="background:#7cfc00;"| UK airdate |- | colspan="5" style="background:#32cd32;"| |- |} ==DVDS releases== ===Region 1 (United States/Canada)=== The version released on DVD and SDBD is the English dubbed version by 4Kids Entertainment. The DVDs were distributed through Shout Factory. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Volume ! Volume Name ! Release Date ! Contents |- |1 |The Adventure Begins... |23 September 2008 |Episodes 1 – 5 |- |2 |Downtown Showdown |3 February 2009 |Episodes 6 – 10 |- |3 |Volcanic Panic |30 June 2009 |Episodes 11 – 15 |} Announced on 24 September 2018, Discotek Media announced its license and is planning to release the series on two SDBD sets for each season. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Season ! Release Date ! Contents |- |1 |rowspan=2|27 November 2018 |Episodes 1 – 49 |- |2 |Episodes 50 – 79 |} ==External links== * * Official 4Kids website Dinosaur King
title: List of Dinosaur King episodes
